content: Corporate Training / Workplace Learning | Temasek Polytechnic INVEST & IGNITE SHARE DIGITAL FILM & TELEVISION | SCHOOL OF DESIGN | TEMASEK POLYTECHNICS https://www.tp.edu.sg/ Partnering with you in transforming your workforce skills! At Temasek Polytechnic, we offer comprehensive corporate training solutions tailored to the evolving needs of modern businesses. Through strategic partnerships and customised in-house training programmes, we focus on continuous staff development, enhancing workplace learning capabilities, and empowering the workforce with advanced skills in emerging technologies. Our tailored approach ensures that organisations can effectively address business transformation needs, retain workforce competency, and stay competitive in the fast-paced industry landscape. With a focus on upskilling and reskilling, we support enterprises in navigating the challenges of the digital era while providing advisory on funding support and career conversion programmes. INNOVATIVE TRAINING SOLUTIONS Temasek Polytechnic offers strategic, customised training for continuous staff development and digital transformation. ACCELERATE CORPORATE GROWTH Enhance your business with our tailored Mentorship Support Programme for optimal success and growth. ADVISORY SERVICES Get expert advice on skills training and funding opportunities to enhance your workforce capabilities. Our Solutions Customised Corporate Training & Collaborations Your organisation’s strategy for success starts here! We can help to recommend, design and conduct customised training solutions, as well as work with you to achieve various staff development needs. MORE DETAILS NACE@TP National Centre of Excellence for Workplace Learning (NACE@TP) helps businesses enhance performance and retain workforce competency with a top-tier structured training system. Transform your business by redesigning jobs, reskilling staff, and upskilling through workplace learning. MORE DETAILS AI Empowerment Hub Temasek Polytechnic, with Republic Polytechnic and Generation Singapore, offers IMDA-approved training in Software Engineering, AI, Analytics, and Cloud Computing to help organisations and adult learners stay relevant in ICT roles. MORE DETAILS Testimonials Find out what our clients have to say. "Temasek Poly is a great training partner. They are flexible, cooperative and we are happy with the smooth running of the course." Sean Ng Institute of Engineers Singapore (IES) Academy “JEN Singapore Tanglin & Orchardgateway by Shangri-La partnered with TP to successfully roll out online Micro-Learning Courses to our colleagues, offering them a chance to pick up varied skills that are important and essential to prepare themselves post-Covid.” Jonathan Ng Cluster Director of Human Resources JEN Singapore Orchardgateway by Shangri-La & JEN Singapore Tanglin by Shangri-La “The Micro-Learning Courses not only provide our employees with short bursts of focused educational content that fit into a daily workflow, the bite-sized content is also accessible on any device including mobile devices so that they can learn anytime, anywhere. Temasek Polytechnic provides performance support resources to track employees’ performance data so our HR division can audit, adjust and improve training efforts.
